trans-unit.source: Specifies the XSLT features to support during execution of the XSLT style sheet.
Embedded script blocks and the XSLT `document()` function are optional features on the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class.
These features are disabled by default.
The XsltSettings class specifies which of these optional features to support.
Features are enabled or disabled using the class properties.
The XsltSettings object is then passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
> [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
Do not enable scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source.
If you cannot verify the source of the style sheet, or if the style sheet does not come from a trusted source, use the default XSLT settings.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> class with default settings.
The new <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings> object does not support the XSLT `document()` function or embedded script blocks.
> [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.

If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> class with the specified settings.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable support for the XSLT `document()` function; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable support for embedded scripts blocks; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with default settings.
Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks is disabled.

An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableDocumentFunction*> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableScript*> properties set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for the XSLT `document()` function.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to support the XSLT `document()` function; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for embedded script blocks.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to support script blocks in XSLT style sheets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object that enables support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks.

An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableDocumentFunction*> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableScript*> properties set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
